trans-unit.source: Associates a class with a column in a database table.
trans-unit.target: 將類別與資料庫資料表中的資料行產生關聯。

trans-unit.source: Use this attribute to designate a member of an entity class to represent a column in a database table.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性 (Attribute) 可以指定實體類別的成員，以代表資料庫資料表中的資料行。

trans-unit.source: You can apply this attribute to any field or property that is `public`, `private`, or `internal`.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此屬性套用至任何欄位或屬性， `public`， `private`，或`internal`。

trans-unit.source: Only those entity class members identified as columns are persisted when [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] saves changes to the database.
trans-unit.target: 只有那些實體類別成員識別為資料行保存時[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]將變更儲存到資料庫。

trans-unit.source: Use commas to separate multiple properties on the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 使用逗號來分隔多個屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AutoSync" /> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AutoSync" /> 列舉。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AutoSync" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.AutoSync" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a column can contain null values.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行是否可以包含 null 值。

trans-unit.source: Default = <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設 = <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: If you set this value to `false`, the data in the corresponding column is assumed to be non-null.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將此值設定為`false`，對應的資料行中的資料會被假設為非 null。

trans-unit.source: This property is duplicated from the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A> property for convenience.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會複製從<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>方便的屬性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.CreateDatabase%2A> method uses only the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.CreateDatabase%2A>方法只會使用<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: For this reason, you must specify whether a column can contain null values in the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A> property also.
trans-unit.target: 基於這個理由，您必須指定資料行是否可以包含 null 值在<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>屬性也。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of the database column.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料庫資料行的型別。

trans-unit.source: String value that specifies the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration.
trans-unit.target: 字串值，指定 T-SQL 資料表宣告中定義的資料行的確切文字。

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the exact text that defines the column in a Transact-SQL table declaration.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性來指定 T-SQL 資料表宣告中定義的資料行的確切文字。

trans-unit.source: Specify the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A> property only if you plan to use <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.CreateDatabase%2A> to create an instance of the database.
trans-unit.target: 指定<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>屬性只有當您打算使用<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.CreateDatabase%2A>來建立資料庫的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The default value of <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A> is inferred from the member type.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>推斷的成員型別。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [SQL-CLR Type Mapping](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[SQL CLR 類型對應](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/sql/linq/sql-clr-type-mapping.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a column is a computed column in a database.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行是否為資料庫中的計算資料行。

trans-unit.source: Default = empty.
trans-unit.target: 預設 = 空白。

trans-unit.source: Use this property when you use <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.CreateDatabase%2A> to define a column as containing computed values.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個屬性，當您使用<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.CreateDatabase%2A>資料行定義為包含計算的值。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to create a column defined in SQL as `InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`, use the following *expression* string: `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果您想要建立資料行定義中做為 SQL `InventoryVal AS UnitPrice * UnitsInStock`，使用下列*運算式*字串： `"UnitPrice * UnitsInStock"`。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not support computed columns as primary keys.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支援以計算資料行做為主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a column contains values that the database auto-generates.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行是否包含資料庫自動產生的值。

trans-unit.source: Default = <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設 = <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsDbGenerated%2A> members are synchronized immediately after the row of data is inserted, and the members are available after <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.SubmitChanges%2A> is completed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsDbGenerated%2A> 插入資料列，而成員之後，才能使用之後，立即同步處理成員<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.SubmitChanges%2A>完成。

trans-unit.source: If the column holds primary key values and you designate <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsDbGenerated%2A> as `true`, you should also add the <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A> property by using the `IDENTITY` modifier.
trans-unit.target: 如果資料行包含主索引鍵值，並指定<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsDbGenerated%2A>為`true`，您也應該加入<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>屬性使用`IDENTITY`修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether a column contains a discriminator value for a [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] inheritance hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料行是否包含 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 繼承階層架構的鑑別子值。

trans-unit.source: Default = <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設 = <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When `true`, this property identifies the class member as holding the discriminator value for an inheritance hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 當`true`，這個屬性會識別為保留鑑別子值繼承階層架構的類別成員。

trans-unit.source: You can set this property to `true` for no more than one member, which must belong to the topmost mapped class in the hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將此屬性設定為`true`表示 否一個以上的成員，必須屬於最上層對應的階層中的類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether this class member represents a column that is part or all of the primary key of the table.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個類別成員是否表示資料表主索引鍵一部分或全部的資料行。

trans-unit.source: Default = <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設 = <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Assuming an entity class, you must provide at least one member with this attribute, and it must be mapped to the primary key or a unique key in the corresponding table or view.
trans-unit.target: 假設的實體類別，您必須利用此屬性，提供至少一個成員，它必須對應到主索引鍵或唯一索引鍵對應的資料表或檢視表中。

trans-unit.source: Failure to do this prompts [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] to consider instances of the class as read-only for submitting changes to the database.
trans-unit.target: 無法執行此提示[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]考慮以唯讀狀態的變更送出至資料庫類別的執行個體。

trans-unit.source: If you designate more than one member of the class by using this property, the key is said to be a composite of the associated columns.
trans-unit.target: 如果您使用這個屬性來指定多個成員的類別，金鑰即為相關聯的資料行中的複合。

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] does not support computed columns as primary keys.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 不支援以計算資料行做為主索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether the column type of the member is a database timestamp or version number.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定成員的資料行型別是否為資料庫時間戳記或版本號碼。

trans-unit.source: Default value = <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值 = <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated.
trans-unit.target: 版本號碼會遞增，並且會更新相關聯的資料列，每次更新時間戳記資料行。

trans-unit.source: (This property tells [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] that a column should be updated to show that it is a new version; it is not meant to record information such as who made the update.)
trans-unit.target: (這個屬性會告知[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]，應更新的資料行，以顯示它是新的版本; 並非用於記錄的資訊，例如人員進行更新。)

trans-unit.source: Note the following when `IsVersion` is true:
trans-unit.target: 請注意下列事項時`IsVersion`成立：

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A> to specify the correct modifiers to designate a version number or timestamp column.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>指定正確的修飾詞，以指定的版本號碼或時間戳記資料行。

trans-unit.source: If you do not specify <xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>, [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] infers the correct modifiers.
trans-unit.target: 如果您未指定<xref:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.DbType%2A>，[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]推斷正確的修飾詞。

trans-unit.source: Version numbers are incremented and timestamp columns are updated every time that the associated row is updated.
trans-unit.target: 版本號碼會遞增，並且會更新相關聯的資料列，每次更新時間戳記資料行。

trans-unit.source: Members with `IsVersion=true` are synchronized immediately after the data row is updated.
trans-unit.target: 具有成員`IsVersion=true`立即更新資料列之後，才會同步處理。

trans-unit.source: The new values are visible after <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.SubmitChanges%2A> finishes.
trans-unit.target: 新的值便可見之後<xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.SubmitChanges%2A>完成。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] approaches the detection of optimistic concurrency conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] 如何處理開放式並行存取 (Optimistic Concurrency) 衝突的偵測。

trans-unit.source: Default = <see cref="F:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.UpdateCheck.Always" />, unless <see cref="P:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsVersion" /> is <see langword="true" /> for a member.
trans-unit.target: 除非成員的 <see cref="F:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.UpdateCheck.Always" /> 為 <see langword="true" />，否則預設 = <see cref="P:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.ColumnAttribute.IsVersion" />。

trans-unit.source: Other values are <see cref="F:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.UpdateCheck.Never" /> and <see cref="F:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.UpdateCheck.WhenChanged" />.
trans-unit.target: 其他值為 <see cref="F:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.UpdateCheck.Never" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.Data.Linq.Mapping.UpdateCheck.WhenChanged" />。

trans-unit.source: When this property is used with one of three enums, it determines how [!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)] detects concurrency conflicts.
trans-unit.target: 當搭配三個列舉的其中一個使用這個屬性時，它會判斷如何[!INCLUDE[vbtecdlinq](~/includes/vbtecdlinq-md.md)]偵測並行衝突。

trans-unit.source: If no member is designed as `IsVersion=true`, original member values are compared with the current database state.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有成員旨在做為`IsVersion=true`，原始的成員值與目前的資料庫狀態進行比較。

trans-unit.source: The following enums are available:
trans-unit.target: 下列列舉可用：

trans-unit.source: `Always` Always use this column for conflict detection.
trans-unit.target: `Always` 衝突偵測，一律使用這個資料行。

trans-unit.source: `Never` Never use this column for conflict detection.
trans-unit.target: `Never` 衝突偵測，永遠不會使用此資料行。

trans-unit.source: `WhenChanged` Use this column only when the member has been changed by the application.
trans-unit.target: `WhenChanged` 成員已變更應用程式時，才使用此資料行。
